charged.text.name: §aCharged§r
gamerule.PlayerHeadDrop: Players killed by Charged-Creepers may drop a head.
gamerule.PlayerHeadDropTextures: When player drop heads, they will use their players' texture.
gamerule.PlayerHeadTextureWashing: Textured player heads may be untextured with a Cauldron of water.
gamerule.maxHeadDropCount: Maximum heads drop from a single Charged-Creepers' kills; when negative, limits are disabled.
